headline.main: VICHY STILL TRIES TO 'COLLABORATE'; In the Economic Field Much Has Been Done to Unify France and the Reich

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 8 -- "Collaboration" between defeated France and victorious Germany came into being on Oct. 24, 1940, when Marshal Petain, Chief of the French State, met at Montoire Adolf Hitler, Fuehrer of the German Reich, and was received with "deference and courtesy."
